mapper.update:
update BOT_CHAT_RESPONSE_MESSAGE
NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RESPONSE_ID = #{responseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MESSAGE_TIP = #{messageTip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARRAY_INDEX = #{arrayIndex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SUB_INDEX = #{subIndex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUMMARY = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KNOWLEDGE_ID = #{knowledgeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANSWER_SOURCE = #{answerSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELECTED = #{selected,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CLICKED_TIME = #{clickedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DURATION = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update BOT_CHAT_RESPONSE_MESSAGE set NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RESPONSE_ID = #{responseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MESSAGE_TIP = #{messageTip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARRAY_INDEX = #{arrayIndex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SUB_INDEX = #{subIndex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUMMARY = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KNOWLEDGE_ID = #{knowledgeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWER_SOURCE = #{answerSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELECTED = #{selected,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CLICKED_TIME = #{clickedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DURATION = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOT_CHAT_RESPONSE_MESSAGE WHERE CREATION_DATE >= #{lastCreateTime} ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM BOT_CHAT_RESPONSE_MESSAGE ORDER by CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first}, ${pageSize}
